name: MEC Trail Pack 18L - Unisex
description:
Tiny but mighty, don't underestimate this daypack. It's compact design is ideal for urban commutes or as your carry-on item. It can still take a hydration sleeve, making it a solid choice for skiers, hikers and bikers on half-day missions – with the safety bonus of a Recco reflector that's detectable by search and rescue teams.Rugged construction combines 450 and 200-denier recycled polyester for great durability.Clamshell zipper with oversized glove-friendly pull loops.YKK® reversed coil zipper closes smoothly on main and accessory pockets.Shoulder straps in 2-layer foam/mesh fit comfortably.Adjustable sternum strap takes the tension off your shoulders.Textured backsheet with mesh and foam construction sits comfortably on your back.Top accessory pocket with a key clip keeps personal items secure.2 stretch mesh side pockets with elastic edge to hold bottles securely.10mm bar-tacked webbing lets you clip on a carabiner.Webbing loops let you attach poles or tools.Hydration sleeve with hanger and elastic edge holds a water bladder.Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams.

        Sustainability
